content: ff rr ee ee pp aa tt tt labubu labubu ee tangerine tangerine rr bucket hat bucket hat nn @chamomilewonders abbreviations disclaimer mc - magic_ring terms of use please do not copy chain - chain or redistribute any part of this slip_stitch - slip_stitch pattern as your own you may sell skip st - skip a stitch your finished products but credit single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet the pattern creator trbc - treble_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease notes blo - back loop only flo - front loop only fo - fasten_off when leaving a tail to sew wrap x# - repeat the sequence # of times the working yarn twice around the # - indicates total number of stitches opening to get a good length in the row decrease 3 st means you ll make a materials single_crochet decrease with the next 3 stitches labubu measure the project as you go onto 5 mm hook your labubu depending on your yarn or hook size you may need to weight 4 yarn add/subtract increase row sewing needle scissors @chamomilewonders start off with a magic_ring for the base r1 single_crochet 5 5 r2 increase x5 10 r3 single_crochet 2 chain 3 skip st single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet increase x3 15 r4 chain 10 skip 2 st single_crochet in the chain 3 space chain 10 skip 2 st single_crochet increase single_crochet 2 increase x3 16 continue onto the 5th round without slip_stitch into the first chain this is the only time you ll do this… r5 single_crochet 3 increase x2 single_crochet 5 increase single_crochet 3 x6 skip last 2 st slip_stitch into the first st 42 r6 single_crochet 4 increase x2 single_crochet decrease 3 st single_crochet increase single_crochet 4 x2 skip 2 st increase single_crochet 4 x3 single_crochet 4 45 r7 single_crochet 4 skip 2 st increase single_crochet 4 increase decrease 3 st increase single_crochet 4 increase skip 2 st single_crochet 4 increase single_crochet 5 increase x2 single_crochet 4 46 r8 blo single_crochet in every st 46 r9-10 single_crochet in every st 46 r11 flo increase in every st 92 r12 single_crochet in every st 92 fo & hide the tail @chamomilewonders stem r1 chain 22 work into the 2nd chain from the hook… fo & leave a tail *single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet trbc 3 double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet 2* slip_stitch repeat from *-* 44 for sewing now repeat this pattern on the other side of your chain leaf diagram starting/end point s c h d c double_crochet trbc 3 double_crochet h d c s c 2 h d c double_crochet trbc 3 double_crochet h d c s c c s 2 s ls t s s c c ls t s 2 s h d c double_crochet trbc 3 d c h d c c 2 h d h d c s c c double_crochet trbc 3 d c sew the stem behind the labubu s ears on row 1 @chamomilewonders finished & enjoy ♡ tag me in your projects @chamomilewonders
